WorkItem.Description: In the referenced System.Windows.Interactivity library that comes with the installer TriggerCollection (aka AttachableCollection) is now an ObservableCollection instead of a DependencyObjectCollection (as it was before) and so Bindings (for example Command) on EventToCommand do not work...
WorkItem.Summary: EventToCommand not working on MvvmLight v4 RTM for WP71

Comments.Message:
Hi,

I just tested and EventToCommand works as expected. Can you provide a repro so that I can investigate your problem?

Thanks,
Laurent

Hi Laurent,

My bad.I retried it clean and it worked.Something had happened with my new project setup and for some reason i was referenencing a different Interactivity version dll with the problem i mention i above.Wierd because i could have sworn i had added the one from the MvvmLight setup.Anyways.

Thanks!

Anargyros
No problems, happy it works now.
